name: Slither
description:
Slither is a very simple take on snake.

This is a prototype of an upcoming 21st century version of snake.

Think of this as a tech-tech demo. A demo of a demo.

The game will be updated regularly as I work towards the full game.

The reason that there is a small price on this is to help me fund the game in the future. If you are to buy it now you are getting a deal because when the v1 of the game is released the price will be considerably higher.

Controls -

Arrow Keys to change the direction of the snake

Escape to Quit

If you are not happy with your purchase for whatever reason you have one month from buying the game to request a refund.
